results.definition: the hand that is on the left side of the body
the piece of ground in the outfield on the catcher's left
examples: the batter flied out to left

results.definition: those who support varying degrees of social or political or economic change designed to promote the public welfare

examples: she had a little money left over so she went to a movie
I rarely lose a left-hand glove

results.definition: a turn toward the side of the body that is on the north when the person is facing east
examples: take a left at the corner

results.definition: being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north
examples: the left bank of a river is bank on your left side when you are facing downstream

results.definition: location near or direction toward the left side; i.e. the side to the north when a person or object faces east
of or belonging to the political or intellectual left
toward or on the left; also used figuratively
examples: the political party has moved left
